content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"This course is created for newly joined EPAM Project Managers, for the colleagues who want to become a Project Manager or already do a Project Management work and want to improve their knowledge.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"By this course we would like to ensure all our PMs use same tools, techniques and practices on their projects and share same knowledgebase common at EPAM.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":481247,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/0cfa474e-b527-4733-b8dd-50668dce8800/PM.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/0cfa474e-b527-4733-b8dd-50668dce8800/PM.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"PM.PNG\",\"name\":\"PM.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"0cfa474e-b527-4733-b8dd-50668dce8800\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1029,\"height\":762.9113924050632},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
